song.title: Shady Grove
song.chorus: Shady Grove My little love Shady Grove, I know Shady Grove My little love I'm bound for Shady Grove
song.verse: Peaches in the summertime Apples in the fall If I can't have the girl I love I don't want none at all
I wish I had a banjo string Made of golden twine And every tune I played on it I wish that girl was mine
I wish I had a needle and thread The finest that could sew I'd sew that pretty girl to my side And down the road I'd go
Cheeks as red as the bloomin' rose Eyes of the prettiest brown She is the darling of my heart The prettiest girl in town
Some come here to fiddle and dance Some come here to tarry Some come here to fiddle and dance I came here to marry
